title.rendered: Board of Education Policies Available Online

content.rendered: The Saratoga Springs City School District’s Board of Education Policies are available online through a Board of Education Policy Manual. The online policy manual provides the district’s board of education policies, regulations, and related documents in a fully searchable, easy-to-use format. The policies of the Board of Education are reviewed periodically, and some policies are required by New York State law to be reviewed annually. Questions related to policies may be directed to the Superintendent’s Office by calling 518-583-4708.
